EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: See you Thursday for the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up this Thursday in Minneapolis. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, October 2, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/minneapolis>
Sheraton Bloomington Hotel Fountainebleau Room, Lower Level 5601 West 78th Street Minneapolis, MN 55439 Map and Driving Directions <http://www.starwoodhotels.com/sheraton/property/area/map.html?propertyID=4013> Complimentary valet and self parking available
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans)
- The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
Questions? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io>or via cell at 408-425-9302 <tel:408-425-9302>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to workshop details & registration <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/minneapolis>.
